events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department as you have relevant software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process for the developer vacancy.
The initial screening call went well, confirming your skills in software engineering and your enthusiasm to work with us.
Thank you for your timely response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, focusing on software development and devops skills.
